description: Associates one or more security groups with your load balancer in a virtual private cloud (VPC). The specified security groups override the previously associated security groups. For more information, see Security Groups for Load Balancers in a VPC in the Classic Load Balancers Guide.

parameters.name: LoadBalancerName
parameters.description: The name of the load balancer.

parameters.name: SecurityGroups
parameters.description: The IDs of the security groups to associate with the load balancer. Note that you cannot specify the name of the security group. (string) ---

nested_items.name: SecurityGroups
nested_items.description: The IDs of the security groups associated with the load balancer.
